name: Nanomon
description:
Datamon is a robotic machine Digimon with long arms, big hands, and four small feet. It has a robotic yellow eye on the left on its face, and a cracked cavity on right on its face, with an organic red eye. It has a large dome on its head with a few cracks. Inside the dome is a computer engine.
In Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth , Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory , Digimon World: Next Order , Digimon Links , and Digimon ReArise , Datamon's dome isn't damaged.
